scripts.dev: uv run python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host localhost --port 8000 --reload
scripts.typecheck: uv run python -m mypy app/ --ignore-missing-imports || echo 'mypy not installed, skipping type check'
scripts.init-db: uv run python -c "from app.core.database import init_db; import asyncio; asyncio.run(init_db())"
scripts.check-db: uv run python -c "from app.core.database import get_db; print('Database connected!')"
scripts.inspect-model:json-file: uv run python scripts/inspect_model.py --format json --output-file model_inspection.json
scripts.debug:web-status: curl -s http://localhost:3000 | grep -o '<title>.*</title>' || echo 'Web app not responding'
scripts.debug:db-version: uv run python -c "from app.core.database import engine; from sqlalchemy import text; conn = engine.connect(); result = conn.execute(text('SELECT version()')); print('PostgreSQL:', result.fetchone()[0]); conn.close()"
scripts.debug:db-tables: uv run python -c "from app.core.database import engine; from sqlalchemy import inspect; inspector = inspect(engine); tables = inspector.get_table_names(); print('Tables:', tables); [print(f'{table}: {len(inspector.get_columns(table))} columns') for table in tables]"
scripts.debug:model-status: uv run python -c "from app.services.mmm_service import MMMService; service = MMMService(); model = service._load_model(); print('Model loaded successfully'); print('Model type:', type(model))" || echo 'Model loading failed'
scripts.debug:env-vars: uv run python -c "import os; from app.core.config import settings; print('Database URL:', settings.DATABASE_URL[:50] + '...'); print('Debug mode:', settings.DEBUG); print('Environment:', os.getenv('ENVIRONMENT', 'development'))"
scripts.debug:memory: uv run python -c "import psutil; import os; process = psutil.Process(os.getpid()); print(f'Memory usage: {process.memory_info().rss / 1024 / 1024:.1f} MB'); print(f'CPU usage: {process.cpu_percent()}%')"
scripts.debug:ports: lsof -i :8000 -i :3000 -i :5432 || echo 'No processes found on MMM ports'
scripts.debug:logs: docker logs docker-postgres-1 --tail 20 || echo 'No docker logs available'
